mapper.update:
update jy_picking_send_record set scan_code = #{scanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scan_flag = #{scanFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, scan_code_type = #{scanCodeType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, picking_user_erp = #{pickingUserErp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picking_user_name = #{pickingUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picking_time = #{pickingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
more_scan_flag = #{moreScanFlag},
send_flag = #{sendFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
real_next_site_id = #{realNextSiteId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
box_real_flow_key = #{boxRealFlowKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
more_send_flag = #{moreSendFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
send_time = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
send_user_erp = #{sendUserErp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
send_user_name = #{sendUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime} where yn = 1 and picking_site_id = #{pickingSiteId} and biz_id = #{bizId} and package_code = #{packageCode}

update jy_picking_send_record set wait_scan_code = #{waitScanCode}, wait_scan_code_type = #{waitScanCodeType}, wait_scan_flag = #{waitScanFlag}, init_time = #{initTime},
init_next_site_id = #{initNextSiteId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
box_init_flow_key = #{boxInitFlowKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime} where yn = 1 and picking_site_id = #{pickingSiteId} and biz_id = #{bizId} and package_code = #{packageCode}
